DOC.brief_summary: Study objective is to assess the interest of the relational touch before an arterial puncture to reduce pain on patient in intensive care unit.
DOC.brief_title: Pain Impact Assessment of the Relational Touch During Arterial Puncture in ICU (TORREA)
DOC.criteria: Admission in Intensive Care Unit Communicating patient (able to rate their pain on a numerical scale) Need for a radial arterial puncture for conducting blood tests, apart for the emergency Nonopposition of the patient Age under 18 Tetraplegic patient or having a sensitivity disorder on the limb to be punctured No radial pulse perception
